summary:
By request, a save for the Nord beauty you\'ve seen modeling all my revealing armor 

mods. :)
descriptionHtml:
By request, a save for the Nord beauty you\'ve seen modeling all my revealing armor 

mods. :)

This is the earliest save I have with her current face, which was tweaked a bit 

early in the game.  It\'s still in Helgen, but she\'s already sided with Ralof.

The mods I use:

For skin/face/hands textures, a blend of these:

Detailed Bodies
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=256

Detailed Faces
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26

Detailed Lips
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=689

Beautiful Girl
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=475

I use Optimized Nicer Eyes, but it seems to be gone.  Here\'s Nicer Eyes.
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=841

I use some toned-down elements of Bella\'s Better Females:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

I also recommend Porcelyn\'s New Eyeliner:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=495

I\'m using an experimental tweak of Handsome Hair:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1951

And finally, as pictured, she\'s wearing my Revealing Fur and Fur Bikini:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1959
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2914
author: Clarian
